'''''Lights Will Guide You Home (II)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to follow 6 [[Seelie]] to their Seelie Courts on [[Watatsumi Island]] and [[Seirai Island]] in Inazuma.
